title: Claude Monet Water Lilies Mug
description:
Mug developed from Claude Monet’s Water Lilies, 1906, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Waking up in the morning is a lot easier with a good cup of coffee and our mug featuring a detail from Claude Monet's painting Water Lilies, 1906.  A winning combination: durable, practical, and best of all, beautiful. 

  • Size: 11oz.
  • Dimensions: 3.2 x 3.75 in.
  • Material: Ceramic
  • Dishwasher and microwave safe.
